entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 01 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 01 May 2016
